name: Ensuant
overview:
It’s About Changing the Game

Ensuant has been formed with the vision of delivering game-changing applications for the enterprise in order to help businesses stay competitive in the global marketplace. A well understood effect of the Social and Mobile, the amount of data available in enterprises has seen an order of magnitude increase in the last two decades. The companies that have utilized the deluge of data to improve key business processes such as customer satisfaction, product development, marketing, supply chain, and human resources have outperformed the rest. e.g Amazon, Netflix, Facebook and Google..

Our product ‘bakpak’ is a flexible, reliable, scalable and secure cloud-based digital commerce platform that minimizes the complexities and cost of running world-class global commerce operations. With our Apps, retailers get full control over multichannel functionality and user experience, as well as the time and resources to focus on innovation and driving growth.

Currently, we provide technology that empowers travel, and retail companies and financial services institutions to deliver a rich online experience that goes well beyond what their customers expect.

Some of our solutions include:

  • Travel in a box - Make incremental revenue, with multi products, such as flights, hotels, activities and tours in a easy to use customizable web app.
  • Personalized Pricing/Offers
  • Product Search & Catalog
  • Order Management
  • Social Integration
  • Loyalty Management
  • Customer Support Across Channels
  • Shipment Tracking and Notifications

and more…

If you are someone who gets excited at the idea of working with a smart, dynamic team, obsessed with the idea of creating a platform and applications for business, and still believe that writing optimized code is the only way to programme, do send an email about what you want to do to jobs@ensuantinc.com.

milestones.description: Ensuant gains MGM Grand Resorts International as a customer
